heading:
BPXI078D STOP OF NLSname_type REQUESTED, REPLY 'Y' TO PROCEED.
          ANY OTHER REPLY WILL CANCEL THIS STOP.
content:
Explanation

      The named file system type is about to be stopped.

      In the message text:

      NLSname_type
          The file system type from the FILESYSTYPE statement in the
          BPXPRMxx parmlib member.

      System action

      The system waits for a reply. If the operator replies 'Y' to the
      prompt, processing continues. Any other reply ends the command.

      Operator response

      Reply 'Y' to continue, anything else to terminate.

      System pr ogrammer response

      None.

      Module

      BPXINIT, BPXMIMST

      Source

      z/OS UNIX System Services kernel (BPX)

      Routing Code

      2

      Descriptor Code

      2
